error_msg: The parameters of NumericalWrapperForText must be one or more of ['numeric_classifier', 'tokenizer'].
description: NumericalWrapperForText is a model that allows text classification using numeric classifiers and a tokenizer.

oneOf.error_msg: The 'numeric_classifier' parameter must be a model that implements the NumericClassificationModel class.
oneOf.description: The 'numeric_classifier' parameter must be a model that implements the NumericClassificationModel class.

oneOf.error_msg: An integer greater than or equal to 1 must be entered.
oneOf.description: Minimum n_gram to use in the vectorizer.

oneOf.error_msg: An integer greater than or equal to 1 must be entered.
oneOf.description: Maximum n_gram to use in the vectorizer.
